Html:
I've searched high and low but can't seem to find a direct reference. I cannot get the 11.0.07 msp to apply to a working WSUS/WPP environment. Flash/Reader work fine. I've tried using the MSI product code as a condition for installation and I've tried using nothing. It never seems to report the way it should. If I set nothing, it seems to want to download the update on all of my test computers, even those without XI Pro and those with XI Pro, it fails.

Any tips?
